title: The Bell Tower of Wyndspelle
description: TO WHOM MUST CARYN BE TRUE -the King of England or the Master of Wyndspelle? Was her first duty to the King and the British soldiers quartered in her home? Or to her husband whose revolutionary band plotted against England? Her husband had saved her life, had married her despite her loyalist sympathies. Could she betray him now? Caryn must choose. Upon her words hung many men's lives.
author: Aola Vandergriff
